inclusion.criterion: NIH Stroke Scale on admission to study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Affected Upper limb function on Fugl-Meyer scale
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand instructions and to move freely the unaffected upper limb
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Aphasia or Neglect that impair ability to understand instructions or to execute tasks
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, but no history of allergies or using any medications. His family history is positive for type 2 diabetes.
